body:
Comment 1: 
I have applied changes you provided in wingui_debug.zip file to c3ae7b7f6930. The app
builds and I can run it with no problem. I can't see crash you are seeing. I am using
Windows 7 64bit. Perhaps, you are doing something else. Please, provide more info. Thank
you.

Alex
